PHRASE.LANG: Is he a bit of an exhibitionist? Then let him display his underpants with pride! [#Legal]
Il est un peu exhibitionniste ? Alors laissons-le montrer son caleçon avec fierté. [#Legal]
Ist er ein bisschen exhibitionistisch veranlagt? Dann lass ihn seine Unterhose mit Stolz zur Schau stellen! [#Legal]
Credi sia un esibizionista? Allora fai in modo che mostri la sua biancheria intima con orgoglio! [#Legal]
¿Te va el exhibicionismo? ¡Entonces presume de calzoncillos con orgullo! [#Legal]
그가 약간 노출벽이 있다구요? 그럼 그가 자기 바지를 자신 있게 보여 주게 하세요. [#Legal]
Is he a bit of an exhibitionist? Then let him display his underpants with pride! [#Legal]
他很愛露嗎？那就讓他大膽秀出內褲的一部分吧！ [#Legal]
